summary: This is a work in progress mod. Sam the new over powered companion who is much stronger and more helpful than Lydia. He consist of Dadric Armor and weapons. He can not die because of a custom spell I made for him.
descriptionHtml:
This is a work in progress mod. Sam the new over powered companion who is much stronger and more helpful than Lydia. He consist of Dadric Armor and weapons. He can not die because of a custom spell I made for him. Only your character can kill him in one strike. 

If you kill your follower he will leave a unlimited amount of gold or armor if you want to use him for that.
author: PhantomGamer_Youtber
